component.name: SimpleTaskScene
component.script:
sub init() m.top.backgroundURI = "pkg:/images/purplebg.jpg"
m.indexLabel = m.top.findNode("indexLabel") m.simpleTask = CreateObject("roSGNode", "SimpleTask") m.simpleTask.ObserveField("index", "onIndexChanged") m.simpleTask.control = "RUN" end sub
function onIndexChanged() as void str = "Your Dlink Plug has been turned ON." m.indexLabel.text = str end function
function onKeyEvent(key as String, press as Boolean) as Boolean print key end function
